---
name: performance-ux
description: Optimize performance and UX with responsive layouts, accessible typography, and persistent dark mode.
---

Use this skill when improving site performance and user experience.

Guidelines:
- Optimize for fast load times and minimal bundle sizes.
- Implement responsive layouts with accessible typography and spacing.
- Add dark mode with persistence using local storage or prefers-color-scheme.
- Prefer simple, maintainable patterns.
